# Country names

The function `countryname` tries to convert country names from any language. For example:

```{r}
library(countrycode)
x <- c('ジンバブエ', 'Afeganistãu',  'Barbadas', 'Sverige', 'UK',  
       'il-Georgia tan-Nofsinhar u l-Gżejjer Sandwich tan-Nofsinhar')

countryname(x)

countryname(x, 'iso3c')
```
